description: The OpenAlex ID for this award.
name: id

description: The name or title of the award, if available.
name: display_name

description: A description of the award, if available.
name: description

description: The award identifier as assigned by the funder (e.g., the grant number).
name: funder_award_id

fields.name: id
fields.description: The OpenAlex ID for the funder

fields.name: ror
fields.description: The ROR ID for the funder

name: funder
description: Information about the funder that issued this award. Contains:
A list of OpenAlex Work IDs that were funded by this award.
name: funded_outputs

description: The number of works funded by this award.
name: funded_outputs_count

description: The monetary amount of the award, if available.
name: amount

description: The currency of the award amount (e.g., USD, EUR), if available.
name: currency

description: The type of funding provided (e.g., grant, fellowship), if available.
name: funding_type

description: The specific funding scheme or program under which the award was made, if available.
name: funder_scheme

description: The start date of the award, formatted as an ISO 8601 date string, if available.
name: start_date

description: The end date of the award, formatted as an ISO 8601 date string, if available.
name: end_date

description: The year when the award started, if available.
name: start_year

description: The year when the award ends or ended, if available.
name: end_year

description: A URL for the award's landing page, if available.
name: landing_page_url

description: The DOI for this award, if available.
name: doi

description: The source of this award data.
name: provenance

fields.name: given_name
fields.description: The given name of the investigator

fields.name: family_name
fields.description: The family name of the investigator

fields.name: orcid
fields.description: The ORCID identifier of the investigator

fields.name: role_start
fields.description: When the investigator started this role

name: lead_investigator
description: Information about the lead investigator (principal investigator) for this award, if available.

fields.name: given_name
fields.description: The given name of the investigator

fields.name: family_name
fields.description: The family name of the investigator

fields.name: orcid
fields.description: The ORCID identifier of the investigator

fields.name: role_start
fields.description: When the investigator started this role

name: co_lead_investigator
description: Information about the co-lead investigator, if available.

fields.name: given_name
fields.description: The given name of the investigator

fields.name: orcid

fields.name: role_start

name: investigators
description: A list of all investigators associated with this award.
A URL that returns a list of works funded by this award.
name: works_api_url

description: The date this Award object was created in the OpenAlex dataset, expressed as an ISO 8601 date string.
name: created_date

description: The last time anything in this award object changed, expressed as an ISO 8601 date string.
name: updated_date
